entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Opt into client side STJ serialization #73317
  • Wrong boxing with IEquatable<T> ? #73310
  • False positive: CS8600 - Converting null literal or possible null value to non-nullable type #73306
  • CSharpIntroduceParameterCodeRefactoringProvider encountered an error and has been disabled #73304
    17.11
  • Intellisense not recognizes extension methods for generic classes from .NET Standard 2.0 references #73302
    Backlog
  • VS2022 - configure severity doesnt work, broken, doesnt do anything..??? #73301
  • Collection expression conversion failure should result in element-wise diagnostics #73297

Closed

  • var and type apparent for nullable types #73312
  • Code clean up does not work for only selected files. #73303
    17.11
  • Using IDisposable will dispose before Task Continuation is completed. #73264
  • Corrección de datos imai #73298
  • Editorconfig in nuget package is not respected if slashes in source file path do not exactly match slashes in .editorconfig path #72657
    17.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge latest bits from 'main' branch into extensions branch #73318
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Add intellisense support for extension types. #73315
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Statically bind invocations in presence of dynamic arguments only for local functions #73314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add AutomationPeer for inheritance marign glyph #73311
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: report specific conversion errors from overload resolution #73307
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73305
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces

Merged

  • Expose some useful helper methods #73289
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move IsBuildOnlyDiagnostic to use a switch expression #73313
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Resolve extension members in all non-invocation contexts #73239
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Replay updates #73308
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Move large static array out of hte large object heap #73299
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge branch 'main' into features/RefInAsync #73300
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Pull reading of last storage subsystem out of lock (part2) #73295
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Handle ref safety analysis for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73281
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Ensure source paths are comparable with editorconfig directory paths #73100
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Allow unsafe blocks in iterators #73046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Lower drop retention from 10 years to 3 months #73190
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Pull reading of last storage subsystem out of lock #73294
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • [WIP] Switch Roslyn protocol types to System.Text.Json serialization #73207
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable Arcade V3 publishing in PR Validation #73221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Partial properties: diagnostics for mismatch between parts #73250
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Opt into stj serialization on LSPclient #72675
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix sorting of extensions from more specific to less #73276
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Fix infinite load loop loading WPF projects in VSCode #72625
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Razor fallback changes #73001
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged
